Package headfirst.designpatterns.combining.observer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern the Observer interface with the update method (param observable) is used by the iterator
    Quackable
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Adapter / Proxy / ~Decorator Pattern: The Interface all the other classes need to be or have to adapt to.
    QuackObservable
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern an interface for the observables that is mother of Quackable
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDuckFactory
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) The Abstract Factory of the Factory Pattern is then instanciated in the Ducksimulator class object then not of type concrete class but interface
    CountingDuckFactory
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Concrete Factory creates QuackCounter Quackables with the specific Duck Subclasses
    DecoyDuck
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable
    DuckCall
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable
    DuckFactory
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Concrete Factory creates "standard" Quackables with the specific Duck Subclasses
    DuckSimulator
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) main Class / usage of the different classes and output
    Flock
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable and uses a Quackable iterator => Iterator Pattern
    Goose
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Adapter Pattern / Proxy Pattern class to get adapted comparable to Decorator Pattern "Core" Class (but honk instead of quack) but does not implement Quackable and does not override Quack => Adapter Pattern or Proxy Pattern
    GooseAdapter
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Adapter Pattern / Proxy Pattern "adapter" class that does the adapting comparable to Decorator Pattern "Decorator" Class (but honk instead of quack) (Constructor takes a goose) Adapter Pattern or Proxy Pattern
    MallardDuck
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable
    Observable
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern the Observable also has the list of iterable observers and is a QuackObservable has the methods needed for an observable (notify, register,..)
    QuackCounter
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable also counts the number of quacks
    Quackologist
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern the concrete Observer => implements Observer
    RedheadDuck
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable
    RubberDuck
    (Commentator sscholz-tgm) Observer Pattern has a "concrete observable" and is a Quackable
